titulo: Xbox Games Showcase 2025 live: All the announcements in real-time
descricao: LiveJoin us for another round of new trailers and big announcements as we cover this year's Xbox Games Showcase.

titulo: This upcoming Korean action game looks like Splinter Cell mashed up with Lollipop Chainsaw, and I am absolutely here for it
descricao: newsMudang: Two Hearts looks very weird, and that's why I like it.

titulo: Dontnod's next game looks like Uncharted's platforming bits as its own thing, in space
descricao: NewsThe reveal trailer looked worlds apart from the studio's choice-driven adventure games.

titulo: Steampunk RPG Clockwork Revolution has finally received another trailer after a basically 2 years of silence
descricao: NewsI didn't imagine Avalon. Who would've thought.

titulo: Persona 4 Revival is officially real, giving us our first look at 4K Charlie Tunoku in a remake with a very angry original voice cast
descricao: NewsAnd just like that, I'm 15 again.

titulo: I'm morbidly intrigued by No Ghosts At The Grand, which looks like Merge Mansion but with talking cats and it's a musical
Age of Mythology: Retold's Japanese mythology-focused expansion just announced it's hitting this fall
Enchanting puzzler Planet of Lana is getting a sequel next year, and I'm already convinced it's going to be more heartbreaking than the last just from its announcement trailer
descricao: NewsStrap in for another enchanting adventure with everyone's favourite girl and cat duo.

titulo: Obsidian announces a sequel to its backyard co-op survival game Grounded—and surprisingly, it'll be in early access next month
descricao: NewsGrounded 2 comes to game preview in July.
